channel.title: Blog on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 發球的心得
item.description: 發球 迷惑性 (發球的準備動作要小，最後的瞬間才發力，但容易誤觸) 中指發力技巧 (https://youtu.be/1AGQQ91to44?t=60) 發上旋長球 （小提拉），不易。 發下旋長球（下切後，小提拉迷惑對手） 發下旋短球或帶點砍，迷惑對手。 林昀儒-實戰 發強下旋(https://youtu.be/ltH1RIs8EUE?t=730) 發弱下旋(https://youtu.be/ltH1RIs8EUE?t=746) 看要發長，卻發短(https://youtu.be/Zj4wpJJtups?t=49) 林昀儒的四大發球神技（Tilong） https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTQuETEghFA 短球側下 短球側（上）旋 長球側下 長球側（上）旋 Werner Schlager 發球迷惑性 https://youtu.be/DK0Mo2iSKZs?t=441 https://youtu.be/SaNOtXVV-3U?t=978 一定要由下往上發球，根據接觸點的不同可以發出側，上，下的不同的旋轉，迷惑對手。 接發球 接上旋球不用引拍，直接借力頂拉過去就好， 接下旋要引拍，要摩擦，

item.title: I like to roar
item.description: Hi, quick update from me. I just want to let everyone know that I like roaring.

item.title: Today I made friends
item.description: I got lost in the woods today. Two friends, a Meerkat and a Warthog, found me, sung a song with me and gave my life new meaning. Today was a good day.

item.title: Vegan experiment
item.description: I tried to become a vegan today. I made it to lunch time and couldn’t bear the sight of another green leaf. Yuck!

item.title: About
item.description: I’m learning Hugo, one step at a time. These are my favorite vacation spots
